title: Make Us More
description: I’ve had enough pain to last me a lifetime. When will enough be enough? Just as my handsome dominate and I think that we have a handle on our lives someone sets out to destroy it.Pictures. So many pictures. Compromising pictures. Career-ending pictures. Life-changing pictures.But I find myself resilient as Alex works to remove the demons from our world. Except this time it’s his past catching up to us. Our wedding should be a joyful time; instead we’re spending our days running for our lives.
author: Renee Harless
